Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a plant that is healthy and growing with enough water and light.
The student can draw a plant that is not healthy due to lack of water.
The student can draw a plant that is not healthy due to lack of light.
The student can use drawings to show the difference between plants with and without water.
The student can use drawings to show the difference between plants with and without light.
The student can identify patterns in the drawings that show plants need water and light to live and grow.
